configurations.name: MANIFEST
configurations.value:
apiVersion: dapr.io/v1alpha1
kind: Component
metadata:
  name: testk8sdaprsecretwithkvconnectionsucceeded
spec:
  type: state.azure.blobstorage
  version: v1
  metadata:
  - name: containerName
    value: test
  - name: accountName
    value: servicelinkerteststorage
  - secretKeyRef:
      name: sc-testk8sdaprsecretwithkvconnectionsucceeded-secret
      key: accountkey
    name: accountKey
